text.0:
If your audiences ask you about legal challenges to #election2020, will you be able to answer? 

Prepare yourself and your newsroom for potential post-election uncertainty by attending our event tomorrow featuring @datasociety:
text.1: Tip #2: When incidents of ballots being found in unusual places (like the trash) are reported, explain to your audiences that this is rare — and tell voters how they can track ballots they fear have been lost. https://t.co/v7hRUfZQUe
